query: { consignments(limit: 2, currentCursor: "consignment-ref1") { pageInfo { startCursor, endCursor, hasNextPage, hasPreviousPage }, edges { node { seriesid, consignmentid, userid, totalFiles, fileChecks { antivirusProgress { filesProcessed }, checksumProgress { filesProcessed }, ffidProgress { filesProcessed }}, parentFolder, series { code }, transferringBody { name, tdrCode }, consignmentReference, createdDatetime, transferInitiatedDatetime, exportDatetime files { fileId metadata { clientSideFileSize, clientSideLastModifiedDate, clientSideOriginalFilePath, foiExemptionCode, heldBy, language, legalStatus, rightsCopyright } ffidMetadata { software softwareVersion binarySignatureFileVersion containerSignatureFileVersion method matches { extension identificationBasis puid } datetime }} currentStatus { upload }}}}}
